empty_filter_buttons.purpose: Quick access to find records with unspecified/empty fields

empty_filter_buttons.ux_convention: Order reflects logical data entry workflow and field importance

language_filters.native_languages_contains: Free text search in native language names (case-insensitive)
language_filters.other_languages_contains: Free text search in other language names (case-insensitive)
language_filters.implementation_note: Requires .distinct() on queryset to prevent duplicate results from M2M joins
language_filters.label_text: Uses 'First and Middle Name Contains' (not 'First Name Contains')

batch_edit_modes.selected: User checked specific rows via checkboxes - no warning dialog
batch_edit_modes.filtered: User applied filters - warning dialog ONLY if no advanced filters active
batch_edit_modes.empty: Start with blank grid - no warning dialog
batch_edit_modes.warning_logic: Warnings appear for filtered mode without advanced filters (editing 'all' rows)
